entry.title: publication
entry.content:
Publications

  1. Y. Tian et al., “Local Manifold Embedding Cross-Domain Subspace Learning for Drift Compensation of Electronic Nose Data,” IEEE Trans. Instrum. Meas., vol. 70, pp. 1–12, 2021, doi: 10.1109/TIM.2021.3108529.
  2. Y. Tian et al., “A Drift-Compensating Novel Deep Belief Classification Network to Improve Gas Recognition of Electronic Noses,” IEEE Access, vol. 8, pp. 121385–121397, 2020, doi: 10.1109/ACCESS.2020.3006729.
  3. Y. Tian et al., “Adaptive Gradient Projection Correction Method for Resistivity Array Imaging Logging,” Remote Sensing, Under Review.
  4. Y. Tian et al., “Deep-Learning-Driving Efficient Sparse Target Imaging Method for Array Borehole Radar in Nonuniform Medium,” IEEE Transactions on Geoscience and Remote Sensing, Under Review.
  5. Y. Tian et al., “A Nonlinear Manifold Embedding Extreme Learning Machine to Improve Gas Recognition of Electronic Nose,” IEEE Sensors Journal, Under Review.
  6. Y. Tian et al. “A Deep-Learning-Based Borehole Radar Sparse Target Imaging Method with High Accuracy in Nonuniform Medium,” in 2023 IEEE International Symposium on Antennas and Propagation and USNC-URSI Radio Science Meeting (AP-S/URSI). (Accepted)
  7. 田雨桐等， “基于自适应梯度投影的阵列成像错位校正方法,” 2023年全国微波毫米波会议 （已接收）
  8. R. Yi, J. Yan, D. Shi, Y. Tian et al., “Improving the Performance of Drifted/Shifted Electronic Nose Systems by Cross-Domain Transfer using Common Transfer Samples,” Sens. Actuators B Chem., vol. 329, no. 11, p. 129162, 2020.
  9. Y. Zhang, J. Yan, Z. Wang, Z. Wang, Y. Tian et al., “TDACNN: Target-domain-free domain adaptation convolutional neural network for drift compensation in gas sensors,” Sens. Actuators B Chem, vol. 361, p. 131739, Jun. 2022, doi: 10.1016/j.snb.2022.131739.
  10. 闫嘉，田雨桐等，“一种基于流形学习的跨域子空间学习电子鼻漂移补偿方法”，发明专利 CN 202110923440.4，2021年08月12日
  11. 田雨桐等，“回收用油检测装置”，，实用新型专利 CN 201922490640.6，2019年12月31日
  12. 李廷军，田雨桐等，“一种基于自适应梯度投影的电阻率成像错位校正方法”，发明专利 CN 202210464197.9，2022年04月29日
  13. 李廷军，田雨桐等“一种多基站间基于定位信号转发的位置解算方法”，发明专利 CN 202211088929.5，2022年09月07日

entry.title: any title
entry.content:
Education Background

  • University of Electronic Science and Techonology of China
    Doctor degree candidate, Electronic science and technology (Circuit and System), 2023-Now
    Supervisor: Prof. Yong Li

  • University of Electronic Science and Techonology of China
    Master degree candidate, Electronic science and technology (Circuit and System), 2021-2023
    Supervisor: Associate Prof. Tingjun Li

  • Southwest University
    Bychelor of engineering, Electronic information engeering, 2017-2021
    Supervisor: Associate Prof. Jia Yan

Research Interests

  • Wireless radio navigation and radar-related baseband signal processing,
  • High speed maglev and railway communication,
  • Electronic nose system,
  • Machine learning,
  • Pattern recognization,
  • Optimization theory.

Techniques & Skills

  • MATLAB for Algorithm Simulation
  • Verilog for FPGA Programming and Implementation in Vivado Platform
  • C/C++ for Microprocessors Development (STM32, ESP32, Arduino, etc.)
  • Python for Machine Learning Models Implementations
  • Altium Designer for Circuit Design in System Level

Contact me

  • Tel: +86 199 3447 9024
  • E-mail: yttian2021@std.uestc.edu.cn

Last updated on Jun 12, 2023.
